name: gre_115
description:
Unfolding of a gre_115 sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix is a directed weighted graph first documented by Francois Cachard in 1981. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 115 nodes and 421 edges which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 300 frames
